attributes.action: Road & Motorway Privatisation should not go ahead.
attributes.additional_details:
The current proposals to allow private finance to build, upgrade and improve roads and Motorways are detrimental to motorists And throught the use of vehicle transport for goods and services, all of the population. This proposal can only have negative influence on manufacture, services, industry and the Economy.
If saving in public finance has to be made then more effective and less harmful methods should be found.
